column1: '''The Sword that Was Broken''' is the twenty-first scene of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' and the twenty-fourth of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (extended edition)
column2: ''The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring'' (extended edition)]]. This scene was extended in the latter edition.
